meaningMnemonic: You want things to <kanji>depart</kanji> from your store so you have to <kanji>sell</kanji> them. You put all these things up for <vocabulary>sale</vocabulary>. You are <vocabulary>selling</vocabulary> these items.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
